unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Stir Up a Storm Ahead of Onam**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Stir Up a Storm Ahead of Onam**

unnormalised: Folks, get ready for another round of kitchen budget juggling! Gas cylinder prices have seen a jump again, leaving many households feeling the pinch, especially with Onam just around the corner.
normalised: Folks, get ready for another round of kitchen budget juggling! Gas cylinder prices have seen a jump again, leaving many households feeling the pinch, especially with Onam just around the corner.

unnormalised: Sources say a standard 14.2 kg cylinder will now cost Rs. 1150 in Delhi, a steep rise from last month's Rs. 1100.
normalised: Sources say a standard fourteen point two kilogram cylinder will now cost rupees one thousand one hundred and fifty in Delhi, a steep rise from last month's rupees one thousand one hundred.

unnormalised: "How will we afford to make the Onam Sadhya now?" lamented Lakshmi Amma from Kochi, worried about the increased cost of preparing the festive feast. "Even a simple biryani is becoming expensive!"
normalised: "How will we afford to make the Onam Sadhya now?" lamented Lakshmi Amma from Kochi, worried about the increased cost of preparing the festive feast. "Even a simple biryani is becoming expensive!"

unnormalised: Analysts at the Indian Oil Corporation (IOC) cite global supply chain issues and rising crude oil prices as the reason for the hike.
normalised: Analysts at the I O C cite global supply chain issues and rising crude oil prices as the reason for the hike.

unnormalised: However, critics argue the government needs to do more to cushion the blow for ordinary citizens. Many are calling for subsidies to be reintroduced, reminiscent of the good old days.
normalised: However, critics argue the government needs to do more to cushion the blow for ordinary citizens. Many are calling for subsidies to be reintroduced, reminiscent of the good old days.

unnormalised: Opposition parties are already planning protests, demanding transparency in pricing mechanisms. Looks like the gas cylinder issue is set to boil over, just like a pot of milk on a forgotten stove!
normalised: Opposition parties are already planning protests, demanding transparency in pricing mechanisms. Looks like the gas cylinder issue is set to boil over, just like a pot of milk on a forgotten stove!

unnormalised: Keep an eye on your wallets and maybe start looking up some firewood prices...just in case!
normalised: Keep an eye on your wallets and maybe start looking up some firewood prices...just in case!
